title: Cranberry chutney
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil for frying', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped', '350g cranberries', '4 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '150g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 apples, peeled, cored and chopped', '2 pears, peeled, cored and chopped']
